content:
Ukrainian aviation per day struck 4 areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment of the enemy.

About thisreportedThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

It is also noted that the missile troops have been defeated at the management point, two areas of personnel concentration and one enemy air defense.

As reported by ArmyInform, during the day at the frontrecorded50 combat clashes.

In total, the enemy inflicted 1 rocket and 43 aircraft strikes, made 58 shelling of rocket launchers on the positions of our troops and settlements.

At the same time units of defense forcesstoppedTwo attempts to penetrate enemy DRGs in the Sumy region.
title: Aviation of Defense Forces struck four areas of focus of enemy
description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. It is also noted that units ...
author: Army Inform
